column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Police arrested and a detained driver at 7 Makara Police Inspectorate at 7.40 pmon the 13th of January. June 2019 after a crash Dandenong  on Russian Blvd. in Mittapheap Commune
column4: 7 Makara District.------A driver is a four-and-a-half star military policemen suspected of drunk driving a Lexus 470 which four motorbikes and an Indian tuk-tuk
column5: causing four serious injuries.------The Road Traffic Authority of Phnom Penh is expected to handle the case accordingly.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/312808
